1:
Yahweh, do not rebuke me in your anger\q or discipline me in your wrath.
\q
2:
Have mercy on me, Yahweh, for I am frail;\q heal me, Yahweh, for my bones are shaking.


\q
3:
My soul also is very troubled.\q But you, Yahwehâ€”how long will this continue?
\q
4:
Return, Yahweh! rescue me.\q Save me because of your covenant faithfulness!
\q
5:
For in death there is no remembrance of you.\q In Sheol who will give you thanks?


\q
7:
My eyes grow dim from grief;\q they grow weak because of all my adversaries.


\q
8:
Get away from me, all you who practice iniquity;\q for Yahweh has heard the sound of my weeping.
\q
9:
Yahweh has heard my appeal for mercy;\q Yahweh has accepted my prayer.
\q
10: All my enemies will be ashamed and greatly troubled.\q They will turn back and be suddenly humiliated.
